title: Coconut curry tofu
ingredients: ['2 bunches spring onions', '1 (400ml) tin reduced fat coconut milk', '4 tablespoons soy sauce, divided', '1/2 teaspoon dark brown soft sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons curry powder', '1 teaspoon minced fresh root ginger', '2 teaspoons chilli paste', '450g firm tofu, cut into 1cm cubes', '4 plum tomatoes, chopped', '1 yellow pepper, thinly sliced', '100g fresh mushrooms, chopped', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '275g chopped pak choi', 'salt to taste']
